1.name: Savanna: short dry mild winter, hot wet summer

3.name: Steppe: long cold winter, warm summer, little rain

4.name: Chapparal: wet mild winter, very dry summer

5.name: Grasslands: cold winter, hot summer, some rain

6.name: Deciduous: cold winter, hot summer, plenty of rain

7.name: Taiga: long cold winter, short cool summer, humid

8.name: Tundra: long cold winter, short cool summer, dry
